saao/saa15/P313501
x x x+x mā x x x x ṣābāni annūtu x+x x x annurig ana šarri bēlīya assapra ina x x x annūtu mīni ša šarru bēlī iqabbûni annurig egertu ana ēkalli ussēbila dibbī šunu sanhūti issu libbi egerti ša Il-pada {KUR}x+x-x-a.a x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x tu₂ a x x x x Upi x x x x x x-hu ša Il-pada uttahhiṣ x x x x x-ni ina libbi x x x x x+x-he-e-a x x x x x-du a-du x x x x x x+x pa u₂ x x x x x x x x x x x
